summary: The Housing Unhoused Disabled Veterans Act aims to assist unhoused veterans by amending the United States Housing Act of 1937. It excludes certain disability benefits received under Title 38 from income calculations for eligibility in the supported housing program and for the purpose of renting residential dwellings on Department property. Specifically, it focuses on excluding disability benefits from income calculations for the purpose of determining eligibility for the supported housing program under section 8(o)(19).
